topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a958f0636872493c0000fa#post_55a958f0636872493c0000fa
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a9563d636872728b0039ec#post_55a9563d636872728b0039ec
It's an article talking about how terrible it is that this sports blog outed this Trans woman with a link to an article on the same network about outing gay man[/bq]
You can't spell "progessively increasing in outing glbt" without "progressive".

This is probably going to get political here, but what the fuck is up with "progressives" in the usa outing glbt lately for political stunts?  I read a while back about a father making his son wear a "I like boys" shirt for a political stunt.

Is this the new "in" thing for progressives?  Forcing people out of the closet to further political gain?


This is why even though I'm left leaning and more liberal I don't identify as Democrat cause I've known for years that glbt are just political puppets for progressives.  I knew something was up when Democrats had eight fucking years to legalize gay marriage but never got around to it.  How now that gay marriage is legal liberals are forcibly outing glbt just seals the deal.


Tl:dr; shit like this is why I don't identify politically as a party; both ideological groups are complete shitheads.  Conservatives believe in -beating the living shit out of glbt- "gay conversion" is a "religious right".  Progressives believe that outing glbt for political gain is "the morally right thing to do(TM)"

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a95b6563687268a50002ce#post_55a95b6563687268a50002ce
It's why both Democrats and Republicans are complete shitheads in the usa.


Anyone with a brain could have noticed something off when for eight fucking years Democrats kept metaphorically going "I swear to god and on my mother's life I will legalize gay marriage if you vote for me".  You know who legalized gay marriage?  The court system; Democrats did literally fucking nothing to legalize gay marriage but took all the credit for it.  Obama did literally fucking nothing to legalize gay marriage, but took all the credit for it.


The good thing though is that fortunately people aren't having none of this shit.  The people that are forcibly outing glbt are instantly getting metaphorically crucified.


Tl:dr; say what you will about the usa, yeah the usa is shitty and that, but at least for the most part we metaphorically crucify the people that are forcibly outing glbt for politics.
